DOCUMENT PR-4: ETHICAL SOURCING GUARANTEE

The PoliteRage Promise

Section 1.1: All breakable inventory is sourced exclusively from thrift stores, estate sales, and the unclaimed lost-and-found bins of mid-tier hotel chains. No new object has ever been purchased for the purpose of destruction.

Section 1.2: Every plate, mug, and ceramic figurine receives a brief internal cataloging before its reassignment to active duty. We believe in second purposes, not second chances. The object had its chance. Now it has a calling.

Section 1.3: Vent Valets are trained in the art of standing quietly in the corner. They will not flinch. They will not judge. They will hand you another plate when you're ready. Certification requires 200 hours of supervised silence.

Section 1.4: SmashSpace sources from Walmart. We source from Gladys's estate sale in Tucson. There is a difference, and the difference is character.
